courses.name: Experiential Learning for Arts, Culture and Media Programs

cmCourseInfo.description: This course offers students the opportunity to integrate experiential learning appropriate to students’ fields of study within the Department of Arts, Culture and Media. It provides student experiences that develop work and life-related skills and knowledge through a spectrum of interactive approaches with focused reflection. The course allows students to apply ACM-specific program knowledge and/or essential employability skills. Students must complete an application form made available on the UTSC Timetable and on the ACM website.
cmCourseInfo.title: Experiential Learning for Arts, Culture and Media Programs
cmCourseInfo.prerequisitesText: [9.0 credits in courses offered by the Department of Arts, and Culture and Media], and cGPA of at least 2.5; selection will be based on the application form
cmCourseInfo.note: This is a 0.5 credit course. However, depending on the course content, it may be offered in a single-term or over two-terms. Priority will be given to students enrolled in programs offered by the Department of Arts, Culture and Media.

notes.name: Course Note
notes.content:
Students must submit an application form to be considered for enrolment.

Click here for more information: https://www.utsc.utoronto.ca/acm/2024-land-based-learning-and-arts

You may select this course but will not be officially enrolled until approved. Check your status through ACORN to see whether you have been approved.

(APP = approval; REF = refused; INT = no decision yet)

Lec 01: Land-based Learning and the Arts
